events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car with another vehicle at an intersection on April 30th. Initial details provided for claim registration.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the description mentioning terms like car and collision involving vehicle damage.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the car accident claim and will be the point of contact for the customer going forward.
Customer received an official acknowledgment of the auto accident claim, assuring timely processing and next steps.
Request sent to the customer for submitting the police report and photos of vehicle damage to proceed with the investigation.
The customer uploaded all requested documents including police report and multiple images of the damaged vehicle for claim assessment.
Investigation team began examining the provided evidence and contacted witnesses to verify details of the auto accident reported.
Investigation concluded affirming liability and extent of damages, enabling the claim to move forward towards settlement.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and rental car expenses was proposed to the customer for the auto accident claim.
Customer confirmed acceptance of the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling process so far.
The auto accident claim was officially approved following customer’s acceptance of the proposed settlement amount.
Payment covering the agreed settlement for vehicle repairs and rental reimbursement was successfully transferred to the customer’s account.
The auto accident claim case has been closed following full settlement and confirmation from the customer regarding completion of repairs.
